3fb27220-d1bb-4406-a547-8be789575f13.description: To earn this badge, individuals must complete activities or assessments demonstrating their knowledge and skills in sustainability and social impact. These activities include completing coursework, participating in community service projects, or completing self-guided learning modules. Upon completing these requirements, individuals will be awarded the ‘Daily Impact Transition Badge’ supporting their dedication to creating a more sustainable and inclusive world through small actions.
3fb27220-d1bb-4406-a547-8be789575f13.name: Transition Badge - Daily Impact

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a Schoolab program and learn the fundamentals of an Impactful Innovation methodology.
Applying the skills learned in an impact-driven innovation experience in a real-world context and project.
Demonstrated a daily commitment to positive impact through Inclusive and sustainable personal actions.

cde9deb6-866a-4229-bda6-d355dc70ce68.description: Earners of the Impact Catalyst Transition Badge have demonstrated a solid commitment to positive impact through small-scale Inclusive and/or Sustainable entrepreneurship, community-building, or organizational pathways. Earners have shown an ability to take initiative and lead change within their field. To earn this badge, individuals must complete a series of activities and assessments demonstrating their application of foundational knowledge and skills in sustainability and social impact.
cde9deb6-866a-4229-bda6-d355dc70ce68.name: Transition Badge - Impact Catalyst

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate continued efforts to create positive change through inclusive and/or sustainable entrepreneurship, community-building, or organizational pathways.
Complete an assessment understanding the theory of change behind your platform, initiative, and organization.

a91ea5f4-0d83-4051-ac56-3f654a27d07a.description: Earners of an Impact Innovator Transition Badge have demonstrated a deep dedication to positive impact through Inclusive and/or Sustainable innovation in their careers. They have shown an ability to think outside the box and bring new solutions to the table and have led successful projects. To earn this badge, individuals must complete activities or assessments that demonstrate the application of impact skills through problem-solving and innovative thinking in sustainability and social impact.
a91ea5f4-0d83-4051-ac56-3f654a27d07a.name: Transition Badge - Impact Innovator

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate a longstanding dedication to positive impact through Inclusive and/or Sustainable innovation in their career.

9b9574e9-d119-4e20-8510-711237629f63.description: Earners of an Impact Leader Transition Badge have a purpose-led dedication to Inclusive and/or Sustainable impact. To earn this, individuals must have demonstrated an advanced level of knowledge and skills in sustainability and social impact, as well as the ability to create and facilitate change through innovative thinking and problem-solving. Earners have driven large-scale impact initiatives with significant ripple effects of meaningful change throughout their organization and community.
9b9574e9-d119-4e20-8510-711237629f63.name: Transition Badge - Impact Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Assessment of the impactful change throughout their organization(s) and community(s).

5757a329-fc05-481e-a94c-3f7f375d2634.description: To earn this badge, individuals must demonstrate an exceptional level of knowledge and skills in sustainability and social impact, and a strong ability to drive lasting change through innovative thinking and problem-solving. Earners of a System Game Changer Transition Badge have left a permanent mark on existing systems. They have ushered in systems-level change toward a more inclusive and sustainable future. Earners demonstrate an ability to bring about transformative change in their field.
5757a329-fc05-481e-a94c-3f7f375d2634.name: Transition Badge - System Game Changer

badge_template_activities.title: Assessment of leadership and ability to drive a lasting impact on an industry, community, and system.
